name: Moo Jump
description:
Help Frank the Cow dodge obstacles as they come. Challenge your friends your work and your dog to beat the High score every time.  Mooooooooooooooooooooooooo!

How to play:
1 - Tap Play button
2 - Wait for countdown
3 - Tap left click to control Frank the Cow's jumps
4 - Avoid the obstacles as they come
5 - When you crash just tap the game over button to restart
6 - Beat your high score!

(Look out for power ups)

Updates
This is a seasonal game! That being said Moo Jump will have 4 different playing atmospheres and 4 different Frank the Cow characters to play as the seasons roll through. We will add the ability to change each season in the main menu later on.
